meanings.definition: Traveling from place to place, especially for work.
meanings.sent1: The itinerants workers moved from town to town for their jobs.
meanings.sent2: She admired the itinerants lifestyle of constant travel and adventure.
meanings.sent3: The itinerants workers always had new stories to share from their travels.
meanings.sent4: The itinerants nature of the job kept things exciting and unpredictable.
meanings.sent5: The itinerants lifestyle brought a sense of freedom and discovery.

meanings.definition: A person who travels from place to place, especially for work.
meanings.sent1: The itinerants arrived in the city looking for temporary work.
meanings.sent2: The itinerants were known for their ability to adapt to new environments.
meanings.sent3: The itinerants entertained the locals with their tales of distant lands.
meanings.sent4: The itinerants were like nomads, always on the move for their livelihood.
meanings.sent5: The itinerants brought a sense of diversity to the community.
